statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_and_payment_data;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT payment_amount FROM loyalty_and_payment_data ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE payment_amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE payment_amount < 50 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, payment_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, payment_amount, payment_date FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT loyalty_points, payment_amount FROM loyalty_and_payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 100 GROUP BY loyalty_points ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, payment_amount, payment_date FROM loyalty_and_payment_data ORDER BY customer_id ASC, payment_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT customer_id, last_transaction_date FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY last_transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_payment_data WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment FROM customer_payment_data GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_payment DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, loyalty_points, last_transaction_date FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY last_transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM customer_payment_data WHERE payment_amount >= 50.00 ORDER BY payment_date ASC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC, last_transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customer_payment_data WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, SUM(loyalty_points) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_data GROUP BY loyalty_id, customer_id HAVING total_points > 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT customer_id, membership_level FROM loyalty_program_data ORDER BY membership_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date FROM payment_data ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, min_purchase_amount FROM targeted_promotions WHERE min_purchase_amount < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, membership_level FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE membership_level = 'Gold';
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name, min_purchase_amount FROM targeted_promotions WHERE min_purchase_amount < 50.00 ORDER BY promotion_id;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_data WHERE payment_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data JOIN payment_data ON loyalty_program_data.customer_id = payment_data.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT loyalty_id, customer_id, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM promotion
SELECT loyalty_points, customer_id FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, end_date FROM promotion WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM payment GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, payment_date FROM customer JOIN payment ON customer.customer_id = payment.customer_id ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT loyalty_program_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data;
SELECT loyalty_program_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM targeted_promotions;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM customer_payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_start_date, promotion_end_date FROM targeted_promotions WHERE promotion_end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY promotion_start_date;
SELECT loyalty_program_name, loyalty_points FROM loyalty_program_data WHERE loyalty_points >= 1000;
SELECT customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_data WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
